precondition: The desktop is visible and no windows are maximized.
action: Right Click on an empty area of the taskbar.
expected_results: A context menu will appear with options such as 'Arrange Icons By', 'Refresh', 'Paste', 'Paste Shortcut', 'New', and 'Properties'.

precondition: The right-click context menu is open on the Windows XP desktop.
The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
expected_results: The screen saver preview will update to display the currently selected screen saver.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected.
action: Click the down arrow of the "Screen saver" drop-down list.
expected_results: A list of screen saver options will appear.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab of the Display Properties window is open. The "Screen saver" dropdown menu is open.
action: Click on the "3D FlowerBox" option in the "Screen saver" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The "3D FlowerBox" screen saver will be selected.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Power..." button is visible within the "Monitor power" section.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will open in front of the "Display Properties" window.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected.
action: Click the dropdown arrow next to "Turn off monitor".
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear with a list of time interval options, including "Never".

precondition: The "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu in the Power Options Properties window is open.
action: Click the "Never" option in the "Turn off monitor" dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will close and "Never" will be displayed in the "Turn off monitor" field.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and overlaid on the "Display Properties" window. The "OK" button in the "Power Options Properties" window is highlighted.
action: Click the "OK" button in the "Power Options Properties" window.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close, and the "Display Properties" window will remain open.
